content.question: Your account of the adultery
content.description: Provide the following information about the adultery. If you don't know any of this information, say that you don't know and explain why.
content.remember: Your {{ divorceWho }}  will be sent a copy of your divorce application, so you may want to avoid writing anything that will cause conflict between you. You can discuss your statement with your {{ divorceWho }} if you want to.
content.rejected: Your application will be rejected if you don’t provide enough information to convince the court that your {{ divorceWho }} committed adultery.
content.whatDoYouKnow: What do you know about the adultery?
content.whatElseDoYouKnow: What else do you know about the adultery?
